page.title: 07THE BRIDGE
page.content: In the reign of William the Conqueror the bridge across the Ure was built and soon the borough around the bridge grew up. In the 14th century the old borough Aldborough and the new one Boroughbridge had two members of Parliament.They are now in Harrogate constituency and Nidderdale rural district.In 1322 the battle of Boroughbridge between the Lancastrian army and Edwards 11s supporters took place.The battle was fought for control of the bridge,held by the Kings men, under the comand of Andrew Harcla.
